todo.successful-brigade-practices: T:Successful Brigade Practices - a Zoom seriesD:Monthly Zoom series in an ask-me-anything format with Host Bonnie Wolfe, Brigade Captain, Hack for LA
todo.covid19response:
T:This channel is for sharing information, projects, resources, and asks relative to the COVID-19 emergency. See the pinned post for ways to get plugged in. Please also share projects you're working on.
D:This channel is to be used for the Brigade response to the COVID-19 pandemic. / Coordination with FEMA
